trailingComments.value: * One of the event listeners triggered an activity occurrence event. This gets spammed

trailingComments.value: if(IS_DEV) assert.ok(!dispatch(isRunning), 'activity detection is already running')

leadingComments.value: if(IS_DEV) assert.ok(!dispatch(isRunning), 'activity detection is already running')
